With Whom We Share Information

From time to time, we may use Google Analytics, AdWords and/or AdSense tracking codes, along with other third party services (such as remarketing codes) in order to collect marketing analytics about the pages you browse on our Site or when you undertake specific actions through our services.
Our third party providers may also use cookies and beacons to track your Internet browsing in order to serve you ads based on what they or us believe to be of your interest.

Legal information

Effective date October 15, 2021

California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) Notice for California residents:

NEXT may share or allow third parties to collect personal information through our Services for business purposes we've described in our Privacy Policy.
NEXT discloses personal information for business purposes only.
